name: Quick Popup Anything
author: Monster Infotech

sections.description:
Quickly add powerful modal popups for your WordPress blog or website. Powerful yet, easy to use this plugin will help you to add any shortcode, contact from or grab your visitors attention to introduce them your offers, discounts or other kind of promotional notices.

  • Responsive popup plugin
  • Choose between several button position
  • HTML popup
  • Image popup
  • Customize the look and feel of the popup
  • Work well with contact form plugin
  • Display shortcode output in the popup
  • Responsive popup
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘mi-quick-popup-anything’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the “Quick Popup Anything” list plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Dashboard Menu->Quick Popup to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work with newest WP version and also older versions?

Yes, this plugin works really fine with WordPress 5.4!
It also works great with WP 3.5 – and also should with WP 3.0 – but we only tested extensively with WP 3.5 and 4.0. So you always should run the latest WordPress version for a lot of reasons.

Something is not working. What do I do?

Contact us! Depending on your server configuration something may go wrong, please don’t hesitate on contacting us, we are here to help you! Our support email is: support@monsterinfotech.com

short_description: A lightweight, responsive and easy to use popup plugin. Insert shortcodes & other content from your favorite plugins to create Quick Popup.
